# Python3 API

The following documentation presents the Python3 API.

The Python3 API is generated using [pybind11](https://pybind11.readthedocs.io/en/stable/).

```{eval-rst}
.. automodule:: manifpy
  :imported-members:
  :members:
  :undoc-members:
  :member-order: groupwise
  :show-inheritance:
```
